Born at Annecy and raised in the south of France. I've make my degrees in math and computer science at the University of Grenoble.

I love learning, see a good movie, making piano, fly in paragliding and sometime tinker a friendly web application and mobile.

I enjoy developing and create applications, and am passionate about technology watch. How making a more stable application ? How make a better more simply ? I test new technologies each month since six years for have better vision.

A other point, I'm interesting about the role technology who can spread knowledge which contribute to social change.
